summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2997, for the improvement of Norman Street, from 27th Avenue South to a point one hundred twenty-five (125) feet west of 29th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers and side sewers therein; etc, under Ordinance No. 36118 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
